teamManagement.title: Team Management

teamManagement.name: Name
teamManagement.teamLimitMessage: You've reached your team limit of {{total}} users. Upgrade your subscription to add more team members.

userGuide.title: Daily Usage Guide
userGuide.subtitle: VoiceLink works best when you speak your updates in a structured and clear manner

recordingContacts.title: 1. Recording Contacts
recordingContacts.namesTip: Speak slowly and spell difficult names letter by letter
recordingContacts.phoneEmailTip: Optional, but always spell when in doubt
recordingContacts.newVsExistingTip: VoiceLink automatically searches for existing records and creates new contacts when needed.

conversationInfo.title: 2. Conversation Information
conversationInfo.description: Share important information as if you're telling a colleague.
conversationInfo.exampleText: "He's interested in product X, wants a demo next week, and asked me to send the price list."
conversationInfo.tipText: The more details you provide, the better VoiceLink can fill your CRM. The system automatically creates tags and reports as annotations.

calendarTasks.title: 3. Calendar & Task Management
calendarTasks.description: VoiceLink can automatically create or update appointments and tasks.
calendarTasks.callback1: "I need to call him back Monday at 3 PM"
calendarTasks.appointment2: "Meeting in Tremelo on May 29th at 1 PM"
calendarTasks.update1: "Meeting with Marianna moved to Tuesday 12 PM"

bestPractices.title: 4. Best Practices for Optimal Use

speakClearly.title: Speak Clearly
speakClearly.description: Speak clearly and slowly in standard English

spellingMode.title: Spelling Mode
spellingMode.description: Spell letters for names, emails, and phone numbers when in doubt

autoScheduling.title: Auto-Scheduling
autoScheduling.description: No time mentioned? VoiceLink finds a suitable time automatically

keepFocused.title: Keep It Focused
keepFocused.description: Speak only about one person per voice message.

bestPractices.importantText: You can only update one contact per message. Want to update multiple people in your CRM? Record them with separate voice notes on WhatsApp.

noConnection.title: No Connection?
noConnection.description: Check internet connection and API settings

wrongInput.title: Wrong Input?
wrongInput.description: Send corrections via new voice message

verificationPage.enterSixDigitCode: Enter the 6-digit code from your WhatsApp message
